summary.span: 表示提供对 中的 XML 数据进行快速、非缓存的只进访问的读取器。

span.span: Represents a reader that provides fast, non-cached forward only access to XML data in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 而不是使用，我们建议你创建实例使用类和方法。Instead of using the , we recommend that you create instances by using the class and the method. 这使你充分利用的一致性检查和对 XML 1.0 建议的符合性。This enables you to take advantage of conformance checking and compliance to the XML 1.0 recommendation. `XmlNodeReader`能够读取 XML DOM 子树。The `XmlNodeReader` has the ability to read an XML DOM subtree. 此类不支持文档类型定义 (DTD) 或架构验证。This class does not support document type definition (DTD) or schema validation. 但是，你可以创建对象来包装要验证中存储的数据对象对象，如示例部分中所示。However, you can create an object that wraps around the object to validate the data stored in the object, as shown in Examples section. ## Examples 在以下示例中，XML 文件加载到 XML 文档中并进行修改。In the following example, an XML file is loaded into an XML document and modified. XML 文档传递给 ，后者再传递给 方法。The XML document is passed to an , which is then passed to the method. 在验证读取器分析文件时，可以验证对 XML 文件所作的任何更改。When the validating reader parses the file, it can validate any changes made to the XML file. [!code-csharp[XmlReader_Validate_DOM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_DOM/CS/valid_dom.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReader_Validate_DOM#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_DOM/VB/valid_dom.vb#1)] ## 输入Input 下列文件作为输入使用。The following files are used as input. #### bookSchema.xmlbookSchema.xml [!code-xml[XML_Core_Files#8](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XML_Core_Files/XML/booksschema.xml#8)] #### books.xsdbooks.xsd [!code-xml[XML_Core_Files#9](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XML_Core_Files/XML/books.xsd#9)] ## 输出Output 验证错误：未声明“publisher”属性。Validation Error: The 'publisher' attribute is not declared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的引用页。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 联网的 XML 文档的聚合使用各种 W3C 标准包含机制的数据块组成，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. DTD 实体是该示例，但这并不限于 Dtd。DTD entities are an example of this, but this is not limited to DTDs. 基 URI 将指示你这些节点来自何处。The base URI tells you where these nodes came from. 如果没有要返回的节点没有基 URI （例如，它们已分析从内存中字符串），返回 String.Empty。If there is no base URI for the nodes being returned (for example, they were parsed from an in-memory string), String.Empty is returned. ## Examples 下面的示例分析文件并显示每个节点的基 URI。The following example parses a file and displays the base URI of each of the nodes. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的引用页。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 此方法的内容流式处理，对 Base64 内容进行解码并返回已解码的二进制字节 （例如，内联 Base64 编码的 GIF 图像） 到缓冲区。This method streams the content, decodes the Base64 content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 可以连续调用此方法，以读取大的嵌入文本流。This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途 Internet 邮件扩展） 部分一个： 机制来指定以及描述 Internet 消息正文的格式"。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 你可以从在注释网站的请求获取 Rfc http://www.rfc-editor.org。You can obtain RFCs from the Request for Comments Web site at http://www.rfc-editor.org. > [!NOTE] > 不应访问的任何读取器属性之间调用方法，直到该方法返回值 0。You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the method until the method returns the value 0. 此方法具有以下行为：This method has the following behavior: - 当它已达到它正在操作的字节流的末尾，则返回值 0。 returns the value 0 when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on. 读取器定位在的第一个非内容节点上。The reader is positioned on the first non-content node. - 如果你请求更少，或者在当前位置保持的字节数比流中读取器剩余的精确数目。If you ask for fewer, or the exact number, of bytes than are left in the stream the reader remains in its current position. - 不支持对以下 XML 节点类型： 元素、 XmlDeclaration，无、 文档、 文档类型、 表示法、 实体、 DocumentFragment。 is not supported on the following XML node types: Element, XmlDeclaration, None, Document, DocumentType, Notation, Entity, DocumentFragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的引用页。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 此方法读取内容，使用 Base64 编码进行解码并返回解码的二进制字节 （例如，内联 Base64 编码的 GIF 图像） 到缓冲区。This method reads the content, decodes it using Base64 encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途 Internet 邮件扩展） 部分一个： 机制来指定以及描述 Internet 消息正文的格式"。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 你可以从在注释网站的请求获取 Rfc http://www.rfc-editor.org。You can obtain RFCs from the Request for Comments Web site at http://www.rfc-editor.org. 此方法只能读取简单内容元素。This method can only read simple-content elements. 该元素可以包含文本、 空白、 有效空白、 CDATA 节、 注释和处理指令。The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments and processing instructions. 它还可以包含实体引用自动展开。It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded. 元素不能有子元素。The element cannot have child elements. 此方法是非常类似于方法，但它只能在元素节点类型上调用。This method is very similar to the method except that it can only be called on element node types. 如果计数值高于在文档中，字节数，或是否等于在文档中，字节数读取文档中的所有剩余字节，并返回读取的字节数。If the count value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read. 下一步方法调用将返回零，并将读取器移动到节点以下节点。The next method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the node. 如果调用消耗了全部元素内容时之前，读取器的行为类似于第一个内容已被用尽，然后调用了方法。If you call before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the method was called. 这意味着读取器读取的所有文本，直到遇到 end 元素。This means that the reader reads all the text until the end element is encountered. 随后，将结束标记节点，读取下一个节点，然后将自身定位在下一步的后续节点。It then reads the end tag node, read the next node, and then position itself on the next subsequent node. ## Examples 请参阅若要查看使用此方法的示例。See to see an example using this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的引用页。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 此方法读取元素内容，对使用 BinHex 编码，对其进行解码并返回解码的二进制字节 （例如，内联 BinHex 编码的 GIF 图像） 到缓冲区。This method reads the element content, decodes it using BinHex encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline BinHex encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 此方法只能读取简单内容元素。This method can only read simple-content elements. 该元素可以包含文本、 空白、 有效空白、 CDATA 节、 注释和处理指令。The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments and processing instructions. 它还可以包含实体引用自动展开。It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded. 元素不能有子元素。The element cannot have child elements. 此方法是非常类似于方法，但它只能在元素节点类型上调用。This method is very similar to the method except that it can only be called on element node types. 如果计数值高于在文档中，字节数，或是否等于在文档中，字节数读取文档中的所有剩余字节，并返回读取的字节数。If the count value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read. 下一步方法调用将返回零，并将读取器移动到节点以下节点。The next method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the node. 如果调用消耗了全部元素内容时之前，读取器的行为类似于第一个内容已被用尽，然后调用了方法。If you call before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the method was called. 这意味着读取器读取的所有文本，直到遇到 end 元素。This means that the reader reads all the text until the end element is encountered. 随后，将结束标记节点，读取下一个节点，然后将自身定位在下一步的后续节点。It then reads the end tag node, read the next node, and then position itself on the next subsequent node. ## Examples 请参阅若要查看使用此方法的示例。See to see an example using this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的引用页。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 如果定位在元素上，`ReadString`一起连接所有文本、 有效空白，空白区域和 CData 部分节点类型和返回作为元素内容的串联的数据。If positioned on an element, `ReadString` concatenates all text, significant white space, white space, and CData section node types together and returns the concatenated data as the element content. 它会停止时遇到任何标记。It stops when any markup is encountered. 这可以在混合内容模型中发生，也可以在读取元素结束标记时发生。This could occur in a mixed content model, or when an element end tag is read. 如果在类似文本节点上定位`ReadString`执行相同的串联从文本节点到元素结束标记。If positioned on a text-like node, `ReadString` performs the same concatenation from the text node to the element end tag. 如果读取器定位在属性文本节点上，则 `ReadString` 与读取器定位在元素开始标记上时的功能相同。If the reader is positioned on an attribute text node, `ReadString` has the same functionality as if the reader were position on the element start tag. 它返回所有串联在一起的元素文本节点。It returns all the concatenated element text nodes. ## Examples 下面的示例显示每个元素的文本的内容。The following example displays the text content of each of the elements.
